body: I think the mangaka of this doujin is actually the one who made "my wife is the student council" manga, why i thought so? Because the female clothes is sticking to their skin like it's a latex skintight

@DanteΩ you didn't get it what im trying to say at all...im saying if i was a virgin in late 30's and if i was a teacher im trying to dream/expect that i hope that it will..you know have the same situation as him
@usamiharu the "Wizard" thing is a moniker for people who've hit thirty and are still virgins. Or so I read in another doujin's TL note.
The third chapter is here in raw form if your curiosity gets the better of you . . . . https://nhentai.net/g/174423/267/
I should probably try to become a teacher and announce myself as a wizard wonder if my situation will be the same as this man.....
The first part of the story kind of remind me of another story about a guy teaching an airhead about sexual reproduction for an exam. It was funny but I forgot the name of it :(
"Whan an incredible misinterpretation!!" -most truthful words ever said about hentai logic
Normally he would want to rape them but here he tries to help them and they kinda force him
wow, nice art style and nice scenes.
Haha! these silly highschool girls...i can't wait for ch.3 to be translated.
chie still best girl, but lets see how the tin woman turns out
